name: Zeenia Kaur
description: I am an action-biased Product Designer that uses human-centred design to build and deliver considered, purposeful products and services.
industries: In my career, I’ve had the opportunity to work on high innovation projects primarily in Finance, Government, Culture, and Health sectors with some of Australia’s biggest organisations that are taking measurable steps towards creating positive social impact.
experience: I’ve spent over 5 years working for cool companies like [Mentally Friendly](https://mentallyfriendly.com/), [Service NSW](https://www.service.nsw.gov.au/), [Commonwealth Bank of Australia](https://www.commbank.com.au/), [NSW Health](https://www.health.nsw.gov.au), [Service Tasmania](https://www.service.tas.gov.au/), [UTS](https://www.uts.edu.au/), [Employment Hero](https://employmenthero.com/), [Reserve Bank of Australia](https://www.rba.gov.au/), & [Macquarie Bank](https://www.macquarie.com/au/personal).
hobbies: When I’m not designing I’ll probably be found either dancing or eating, or both.
social: You can find me on linkedin, instagram & tumblr. Or we can chat the old fashioned way, via email.
